item.description:
Hello photographers!

Bring your cameras. Bring your tripods.

If it's a beautiful night we are taking a walk to the parking lot to make night photos. That's right let's get out and play! Learn a little bit about this fun kind of photography and share your knowledge and experience with the group on how to make successful night images.

The last meeting was awesome so We are going to stick with the New Meeting format! The meeting Begins at [b]7:30[/b] PM the Last Thursday of every month.

So from 7:30 to 8:00 will be open and social! Hanging out chit chatting will be encouraged!

The from 8:00 to 9:00 we will have a more organized agenda. A topic, a presentation, a group sharing of images, something related to Photography!

Then from 9 to 9:30 We will hang out again catching up with folks from that evenings topic. We'll clean up and head out by 9:45. Not sticky or ridged just a but more "photo related" verses "social party" ... folks have told me they come here to share. Going forward we will be asking for a donation at the meetups of $5.00 to cover costs. However it's not manditory to attend - just please donate if you can...

 

[:D] Cheers, Donna
item.how_to_find_us: Scott and I are always to try to greet everyone who comes to the meetups.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: The Worcester Photography Meetup Group Monthly Meetup
